Module dp.pa
Package dp.pa.model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
dp.pa.model.Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
The main handler for parts and products of the app. An inventory can contain many parts and products, and can be initialized the app with test data.

      Returns:
      a unique integer to assign to a product id

    • addTestData

      public static void addTestData()
      Populate the inventory with test data. Call this function in the static initializer.

    • addPart

      public static void addPart(Part newPart)
      Adds a part to the inventory and increments the current part counter.
      Parameters:
      newPart - the part to add

    • addProduct

      public static void addProduct(Product newProduct)
      Adds a product to the inventory and increments the current product counter.
      Parameters:
      newProduct - the product to add

    • lookupPart

      public static Part lookupPart(int partId)
      Looks up a part in the inventory by id.
      Parameters:
      partId - the id to search for
      Returns:
      part if found, else null

    • lookupProduct

      public static Product lookupProduct(int productId)
      Looks up a product in the inventory by id.
      Parameters:
      productId - the id to search for
      Returns:
      product if found, else null

    • lookupPart

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> lookupPart(String name)
      Looks up parts in the inventory by name. A part name that contains the parameter string is a match.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search for
      Returns:
      a list of parts that match the param

    • lookupProduct

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> lookupProduct(String name)
      Looks up products in the inventory by name. A product name that contains the parameter string is a match.
      Parameters:
      name - the name to search for
      Returns:
      a list of products that match the param

    • updatePart

      public static void updatePart(int index, Part selectedPart)
      Replaces a part in the inventory with a modified part.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the part in the list to replace
      selectedPart - the replacement part

    • updateProduct

      public static void updateProduct(int index, Product newProduct)
      Replaces a product in the inventory with a modified product.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the part in the list to replace
      newProduct - the replacement product

    • deletePart

      public static boolean deletePart(Part selectedPart)
      Deletes a part from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      selectedPart - the part to delete
      Returns:
      true if successful, else false

    • deleteProduct

      public static boolean deleteProduct(Product selectedProduct)
      Deletes a product from the inventory.
      Parameters:
      selectedProduct - the part to delete
      Returns:
      true if successful, else false
